title: Helmet
data:
***Version [0.27](/0.27 "0.27")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                                           | Helmet        |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | small, medium |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 1             |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | +0            |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +2            |
| Grants                                                         | nothing       |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5             |

|   |                            |
| - | -------------------------- |
|   | A piece of metal headgear. |

**Helmets** are a kind of head [armour](/Armour "Armour") that have 1 base [AC](/AC "AC"), and which may be [enchanted](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") up to +2. They may only be worn by small- or medium-[sized](/Size "Size") adventurers without [horns](/Horns "Horns"), [antennae](/Antennae "Antennae"), or a [beak](/Beak "Beak"). All others must resign themselves to wearing [hats](/Hat "Hat").

Helmets can have the following egos:

- [Intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence") (+3)
- [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible")

## History

- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), you could find hats with [cold](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") and [fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") egos in [ice caves](/Ice_cave "Ice cave") and [volcanoes](/Volcano "Volcano").
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), helmets came in the following descriptive varieties: winged, horned, crested, plumed, spiked, or visored. These descriptions changed the tile used to represent the helmet but had no other in-game effect.

html:
Helmet

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.27: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Helmet
Size to wear small, medium
Armour Class 1
Encumbrance rating +0
Maximum Enchantment +2
Grants nothing
Time to Wear 5


A piece of metal headgear.

Helmets are a kind of head armour that have 1 base AC, and which may be enchanted up to +2. They may only be worn by small- or medium-sized adventurers without horns, antennae, or a beak. All others must resign themselves to wearing hats.

Helmets can have the following egos:

  • Intelligence (+3)
  • See invisible

History

  • Prior to 0.19, you could find hats with cold and fire resistance egos in ice caves and volcanoes.
  • Prior to 0.14, helmets came in the following descriptive varieties: winged, horned, crested, plumed, spiked, or visored. These descriptions changed the tile used to represent the helmet but had no other in-game effect.

'''Helmets''' are a kind of head [[armour]] that have 1 base [[AC]], and which may be [[scroll of enchant armour|enchanted]] up to +2. They may only be worn by small- or medium-[[size]]d adventurers without [[horns]], [[antennae]], or a [[beak]]. All others must resign themselves to wearing [[hat]]s.

Helmets can have the following egos:
*[[Intelligence]] (+3)

==History==
*Prior to [[0.19]], you could find hats with [[cold resistance|cold]] and [[fire resistance]] egos in [[ice cave]]s and [[volcano]]es.
*Prior to [[0.14]], helmets came in the following descriptive varieties: winged, horned, crested, plumed, spiked, or visored. These descriptions changed the tile used to represent the helmet but had no other in-game effect.
